controllerUrl.label: Controller Base-URL
controllerUrl.help: Please enter a valid url including the 'http://' or 'https://'.

updateInterval.label: Update interval (ms)
updateInterval.validatorErrorText: Please keep it reasonably plausible and stay between 500(ms) and 60000(ms = 1min).

requestTimeout.label: Request timeout (ms)
requestTimeout.help: '5000' means 'wait max 5 seconds for a response'.
requestTimeout.validatorErrorText: Please keep it reasonably plausible and stay between 500(ms) and 60000(ms = 60s = 1min).

errorTolerance.label: Max tolerable errors
errorTolerance.help: '3' means 'tolerate up to 3 consecutive request errors'.
errorTolerance.validatorErrorText: Define after how many consecutively failed requests as warning will be logged.
